titleStmt.title: The lamb calling his follovvers to retirement Being a gumble enquiry into the duty of churches, ministers, and all that fear the Lord, under the present dispensation of God. By one that would be found (though unworthy) the Lords witness and servant, and of all his saints.
titleStmt.author: One that would be found the Lords witness and servant.

notesStmt.note: Preface dated: The 25. of the 5. month, 1662.
Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
